description: NeonMenu is a responsive aware menu that progressively collapses options into the mobile menu as the screen size gets smaller. This is a more flexible option than moving directly to a hamburger menu at tablet and below. It is a best effort approach to keep displaying the most important menu items for as long as possible, giving the user a better experience.

props.name: menu
props.description:
The menu configuration. This can have two levels, i.e. a top level horizontal menu and, if required, a dropdown
menu containing the second level. The highlighted 'active' menu is determined by the current Vue route.

props.name: priorityMenuEnabled
props.description:
Whether or not to enable the priority menu which automatically calculates the available screen space and displays
as many of the menu items as possible, moving the remaining items to the mobile menu.

events.name: click
events.description: Emitted when a user clicks on a menu item.
